titles.title: To modify the project for the improvement of the Shallotte River, North Carolina, to change the authorized depth to 8 feet.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 7/8/2011--Introduced. Modifies the project for the improvement of the Shallotte River, North Carolina, to change the authorized maintenance depth to eight feet.
